description: The AWS::GameLift::ContainerGroupDefinition resource creates an Amazon GameLift container group definition.

ContainerDefinition.description: Details about a container that is used in a container fleet

ContainerName.description: A descriptive label for the container definition. Container definition names must be unique with a container group definition.
ContainerName.markdownDescription:
A descriptive label for the container definition. Container definition names must be unique with a container group definition.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9-]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

ImageUri.description: Specifies the image URI of this container.
ImageUri.markdownDescription:
Specifies the image URI of this container.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 255  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9-_\.@\/:]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

ResolvedImageDigest.description: The digest of the container image.
ResolvedImageDigest.markdownDescription:
The digest of the container image.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^sha256:[a-fA-F0-9]{64}$  
Update requires: No interruption

MemoryLimits.description: Specifies how much memory is available to the container. You must specify at least this parameter or the TotalMemoryLimit parameter of the ContainerGroupDefinition.
MemoryLimits.markdownDescription:
Specifies how much memory is available to the container. You must specify at least this parameter or the TotalMemoryLimit parameter of the ContainerGroupDefinition.

---

Required: No  
Type:   
Update requires: No interruption

PortConfiguration.description: Defines the ports on the container.
PortConfiguration.markdownDescription:
Defines the ports on the container.

---

Required: No  
Type:   
Update requires: No interruption

Cpu.description: The maximum number of CPU units reserved for this container. The value is expressed as an integer amount of CPU units. 1 vCPU is equal to 1024 CPU units
Cpu.markdownDescription:
The maximum number of CPU units reserved for this container. The value is expressed as an integer amount of CPU units. 1 vCPU is equal to 1024 CPU units

---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

HealthCheck.description: Specifies how the health of the containers will be checked.
HealthCheck.markdownDescription:
Specifies how the health of the containers will be checked.

---

Required: No  
Type:   
Update requires: No interruption

Command.description: The command that's passed to the container.

items.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 255  
Pattern: ^.*$  
Update requires: No interruption

Command.markdownDescription:
The command that's passed to the container.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

Essential.description: Specifies if the container is essential. If an essential container fails a health check, then all containers in the container group will be restarted. You must specify exactly 1 essential container in a container group.
Essential.markdownDescription:
Specifies if the container is essential. If an essential container fails a health check, then all containers in the container group will be restarted. You must specify exactly 1 essential container in a container group.

---

Required: No  
Type: Boolean  
Update requires: No interruption

EntryPoint.description: The entry point that's passed to the container so that it will run as an executable. If there are multiple arguments, each argument is a string in the array.

items.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 1024  
Update requires: No interruption

EntryPoint.markdownDescription:
The entry point that's passed to the container so that it will run as an executable. If there are multiple arguments, each argument is a string in the array.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

WorkingDirectory.description: The working directory to run commands inside the container in.
WorkingDirectory.markdownDescription:
The working directory to run commands inside the container in.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 255  
Pattern: ^.*$  
Update requires: No interruption

Environment.description: The environment variables to pass to a container.
Environment.markdownDescription:
The environment variables to pass to a container.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

DependsOn.description: A list of container dependencies that determines when this container starts up and shuts down. For container groups with multiple containers, dependencies let you define a startup/shutdown sequence across the containers.
DependsOn.markdownDescription:
A list of container dependencies that determines when this container starts up and shuts down. For container groups with multiple containers, dependencies let you define a startup/shutdown sequence across the containers.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

ContainerDefinition.markdownDescription:
Details about a container that is used in a container fleet

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

MemoryLimits.description: Specifies how much memory is available to the container.

SoftLimit.description: The amount of memory that is reserved for the container.
SoftLimit.markdownDescription:
The amount of memory that is reserved for the container.

---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

HardLimit.description: The hard limit of memory to reserve for the container.
HardLimit.markdownDescription:
The hard limit of memory to reserve for the container.

---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

MemoryLimits.markdownDescription:
Specifies how much memory is available to the container.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

PortConfiguration.description: Defines the ports on a container.

ContainerPortRanges.description: Specifies one or more ranges of ports on a container.
ContainerPortRanges.markdownDescription:
Specifies one or more ranges of ports on a container.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

PortConfiguration.markdownDescription:
Defines the ports on a container.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

ContainerPortRange.description: A set of one or more port numbers that can be opened on the container.

FromPort.description: A starting value for the range of allowed port numbers.
FromPort.markdownDescription:
A starting value for the range of allowed port numbers.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

Protocol.description: Defines the protocol of these ports.
Protocol.markdownDescription:
Defines the protocol of these ports.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: TCP | UDP  
Update requires: No interruption

ToPort.description: An ending value for the range of allowed port numbers. Port numbers are end-inclusive. This value must be equal to or greater than FromPort.
ToPort.markdownDescription:
An ending value for the range of allowed port numbers. Port numbers are end-inclusive. This value must be equal to or greater than FromPort.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

ContainerPortRange.markdownDescription:
A set of one or more port numbers that can be opened on the container.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

ContainerHealthCheck.description: Specifies how the process manager checks the health of containers.

Command.description: A string array representing the command that the container runs to determine if it is healthy.

items.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 255  
Pattern: ^.*$  
Update requires: No interruption

Command.markdownDescription:
A string array representing the command that the container runs to determine if it is healthy.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

Interval.description: How often (in seconds) the health is checked.
Interval.markdownDescription:
How often (in seconds) the health is checked.

---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

Timeout.description: How many seconds the process manager allows the command to run before canceling it.
Timeout.markdownDescription:
How many seconds the process manager allows the command to run before canceling it.

---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

Retries.description: How many times the process manager will retry the command after a timeout. (The first run of the command does not count as a retry.)
Retries.markdownDescription:
How many times the process manager will retry the command after a timeout. (The first run of the command does not count as a retry.)

---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

StartPeriod.description: The optional grace period (in seconds) to give a container time to boostrap before teh health check is declared failed.
StartPeriod.markdownDescription:
The optional grace period (in seconds) to give a container time to boostrap before teh health check is declared failed.

---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

ContainerHealthCheck.markdownDescription:
Specifies how the process manager checks the health of containers.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

ContainerEnvironment.description: An environment variable to set inside a container, in the form of a key-value pair.

Name.markdownDescription:
The environment variable name.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 255  
Pattern: ^.*$  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.markdownDescription:
The environment variable value.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 255  
Pattern: ^.*$  
Update requires: No interruption

ContainerEnvironment.markdownDescription:
An environment variable to set inside a container, in the form of a key-value pair.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

ContainerDependency.description: A dependency that impacts a container's startup and shutdown.

ContainerName.description: A descriptive label for the container definition. The container being defined depends on this container's condition.
ContainerName.markdownDescription:
A descriptive label for the container definition. The container being defined depends on this container's condition.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9-]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

Condition.markdownDescription:
The type of dependency.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: START | COMPLETE | SUCCESS | HEALTHY  
Update requires: No interruption

ContainerDependency.markdownDescription:
A dependency that impacts a container's startup and shutdown.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length.
Key.markdownDescription:
The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^.*$  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length.
Value.markdownDescription:
The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: ^.*$  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Name.description: A descriptive label for the container group definition.
Name.markdownDescription:
A descriptive label for the container group definition.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9-]+$  
Update requires: Replacement

SchedulingStrategy.description: Specifies whether the container group includes replica or daemon containers.
SchedulingStrategy.markdownDescription:
Specifies whether the container group includes replica or daemon containers.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: REPLICA | DAEMON  
Update requires: Replacement

TotalMemoryLimit.description: The maximum amount of memory (in MiB) to allocate for this container group.
TotalMemoryLimit.markdownDescription:
The maximum amount of memory (in MiB) to allocate for this container group.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: Replacement

TotalCpuLimit.description: The maximum number of CPU units reserved for this container group. The value is expressed as an integer amount of CPU units. (1 vCPU is equal to 1024 CPU units.)
TotalCpuLimit.markdownDescription:
The maximum number of CPU units reserved for this container group. The value is expressed as an integer amount of CPU units. (1 vCPU is equal to 1024 CPU units.)

---

Required: Yes  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: Replacement

ContainerDefinitions.description: A collection of container definitions that define the containers in this group.
ContainerDefinitions.markdownDescription:
A collection of container definitions that define the containers in this group.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: Array  
Update requires: Replacement

Tags.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.
Tags.markdownDescription:
An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

OperatingSystem.description: The operating system of the container group
OperatingSystem.markdownDescription:
The operating system of the container group

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: AMAZON_LINUX_2023  
Update requires: Replacement

ContainerGroupDefinitionArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that is assigned to a Amazon GameLift container group resource and uniquely identifies it across all AWS Regions.
ContainerGroupDefinitionArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that is assigned to a Amazon GameLift container group resource and uniquely identifies it across all AWS Regions.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 512  
Pattern: ^arn:.*:containergroupdefinition/containergroupdefinition-[a-zA-Z0-9-]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

CreationTime.description: A time stamp indicating when this data object was created. Format is a number expressed in Unix time as milliseconds (for example "1469498468.057").
CreationTime.markdownDescription:
A time stamp indicating when this data object was created. Format is a number expressed in Unix time as milliseconds (for example "1469498468.057").

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption
